document.full_text: monday morning skate: former islanders are finding new life in the n.h.l. playoffs with tampa bay, sidney crosby's concussion relapse, montreal ponders what do with the underachieving scott gomez.
document.title: monday morning skate: new life for former islanders, crosby's setback and montreal's gomez problem
